metadata.name: FinTech Developer Productivity - Confluence Pages
metadata.description: Mock Confluence pages for FinTech companies focused on developer productivity tools and documentation

data.title: API Integration Guide - Payment Gateway
data.content: This guide covers integration with our REST API for processing payments. Includes authentication, request formats, and error handling.
data.author: Sarah Chen

data.title: Developer Onboarding Checklist
data.content: Complete checklist for new engineering hires. Covers account setup, development environment, code review process, and team rituals.
data.author: Michael Rodriguez

data.title: Architecture Decision Record - Event-Driven Microservices
data.content: ADR documenting our decision to adopt event-driven architecture for transaction processing. Covers rationale, alternatives considered, and implementation plan.
data.author: David Kim

data.title: Deployment Runbook - Production Release Process
data.content: Step-by-step runbook for production deployments. Includes pre-deployment checklist, rollout steps, monitoring, and rollback procedures.
data.author: Emily Watson

data.title: Code Review Guidelines
data.content: Best practices for code reviews including standards, checklist, and feedback guidelines. Emphasizes constructive feedback and knowledge sharing.
data.author: Sarah Chen
